{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AT&T |model=Elevate 4G |revision=Mobile Hotspot |asin= |fcc_date=07/13/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Sierra Wireless |manuf_model=AirCard 754S |availability=AT&T |type=mobile hotspot, 4G LTE router |fcc_id=N7NAC754S |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model= |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm |cpu2_model=Gobi |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=4G, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Elevate-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Elevate-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=attadmin |oui=84:DB:2F }} {{TagLine|AT&T Elevate 4G Mobile Hotspot}} :[http://www.qualcomm.com/gobi/products/att-mobile-hotspot-elevate-4g Product page] ([[Qualcomm]] / [[AT&T]])
The default SSID for these devices seems to be '''Elevate-XXXX''', :where '''XXXX''' is the last 4 (upper case) hex digits of the BSSID.
